artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Irregular stripe pattern. Devoré. Vertical repeat 36", horizontal 51". Pattern of wavy transparent vertical lines with wood grain effect formed by open plain weave areas. thistle
